title: Pasta frittata with asparagus and peas
ingredients: ['250g asparagus, trimmed', '200g frozen peas or petits pois', '150g soup pasta (such as small bows or shells)', '8 eggs', '6 spring onions, thinly sliced', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '2 tbsp olive oil', '50g Caerphilly or Wensleydale cheese, grated or finely crumbled']
